9KFtQW1EMEigUmiV.name: Bounding Leap
9KFtQW1EMEigUmiV.description: Globblit @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leaps} twice; this movement doesn't provoke reactions. If he ends his movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, he can make a melee Strike against that enemy.

4maY1JQ0qP66nbU1.name: Commanding Croak
4maY1JQ0qP66nbU1.description: Globblit gives a loud, belching croak to compel his allies to action. Each boggard within 30 feet can use a reaction to Step, Stride, or Strike.

bcF9DM7Yspy5QfF5.name: Smash and Slurp
bcF9DM7Yspy5QfF5.description:
Frequency once per turn

Effect Globblit makes a greatclub Strike and a tongue Strike against the same target. If the greatclub Strike hits, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against his tongue Strike.

This counts as two attacks for Globblit's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after his Smash and Slurp.

Q07UakEfpYIRHcXo.name: Swamp Stride
Q07UakEfpYIRHcXo.description: Globblit ignores difficult terrain caused by swamp terrain features.

S3GpERUDI1eSnKFX.name: Tongue Grab
S3GpERUDI1eSnKFX.description:
If Globblit hits a creature with his tongue, that creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by him. Unlike a normal grab, the creature isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, but it can't move beyond the reach of Globblit's tongue.

A creature can sever the tongue by succeeding at an AC 18 Strike and dealing at least 6 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to Globblit, it prevents him from using his tongue Strike until it regrows, which takes a week.

q130PaxstauzJP9k.name: Infused Items
q130PaxstauzJP9k.description:
An Aspis technician carries the following infused items:

  • 2 - @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ktjFOp3U0wQD9t0Z]{Lesser Antidotes}
  • 2 - @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.SgtqZxt26BdjUmEB]{Moderate Acid Flasks}
  • 2 - @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.gWr4q4HiyGhETA8H]{Moderate Alchemist's Fires}
  • 2 - @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TZUskLT7yvP7N2co]{Lesser Elixirs of Life}

These items last for 24 hours or until the next time the technician makes their daily preparations.

GeWGtSjnuhl2FyAJ.name: Hunting Spider Venom
GeWGtSjnuhl2FyAJ.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:21]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d10[poison]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[1d12[poison]], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, and off-guard (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[2d6[poison]], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, and off-guard (1 round)

KX4M0Z52AqjzYfNK.name: Poison Weapon
KX4M0Z52AqjzYfNK.description:
Requirements The Aspis technician is wielding a piercing or slashing weapon and has a free hand

Effect The Aspis technician applies a poison to the weapon.

w6XHCpGqr7MStZLG.name: Quick Bomber
w6XHCpGqr7MStZLG.description: The Aspis technician Interacts to draw a bomb, then Strikes with it.

54RP2fDqmOErvH6M.name: Sneak Attack
54RP2fDqmOErvH6M.description: The Aspis technician deals an extra 2d6 precision precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

eyIsTZFeRLHCjdCl.name: Bravery
eyIsTZFeRLHCjdCl.description: When the guard rolls a success on a Will save against a fear effect, they get a critical success instead. In addition, any time they gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition, reduce its value by 1.

koz2XaLl9upQ6tP4.name: Powerful Swing
koz2XaLl9upQ6tP4.description: If the guard hits with a battle axe Strike, they can choose a creature adjacent to the target and within their own reach. That creature takes slashing damage equal to the result of the battle axe's weapon damage dice.

KD228pTR8seugdVW.name: Unburdened Iron
KD228pTR8seugdVW.description: The guard ignores Speed reduction from armor. In addition, any time the guard takes a penalty to their Speed, deduct 5 feet from the penalty.

Nyl6q47yoCS2hMGf.name: Keen Eyes
Nyl6q47yoCS2hMGf.description:
Paga gains a +2 circumstance bonus when using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to find @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creatures within 30 feet of her.

When she targets an opponent that is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from her or hidden, she reduces the DC of the flat check to @Check[flat|dc:3] for a concealed target or @Check[flat|dc:9] for a hidden one.

plleGYTbLH1Htjm0.name: Halfling Luck
plleGYTbLH1Htjm0.description:
Trigger Paga fails or critically fails a skill check or a saving throw

Frequency once per day

Effect Paga rerolls the saving throw and must take the new result.

decwwZMuI2AIpvW4.name: Feign Harmlessness
decwwZMuI2AIpvW4.description:
Paga cringes and cowers before a creature within 10 feet that can see her. The target must attempt a @Check[will|dc:28] save.

The target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Critical Success No effect.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} by Paga until the end of its next turn.

Failure The creature is fascinated by Paga and can't use hostile actions against her until the end of its next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, and the creature isn't temporarily immune to Feign Harmlessness.

i8YSE30xTgZRMBV9.name: Unbreakable Concentration
i8YSE30xTgZRMBV9.description: Paga's spells are disrupted by reactions only if she is critically hit.

BIFXG8tlrggVbQZ0.name: Golem Antimagic
BIFXG8tlrggVbQZ0.description:
Harmed by cold and water (@Damage[5d8[untyped]], @Damage[2d6[untyped]] from areas or persistent damage); healed by acid (area @Damage[2d6[healing]] HP); slowed by earth

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.GolemAntimagic]

qxmme69IDeE8LxLa.name: Vulnerable to Stone to Flesh
qxmme69IDeE8LxLa.description:
A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pr1ruNTbzGn3H9w5]{Stone to Flesh} spell negates Cursebreaker's golem antimagic and its resistance to physical damage for 1 round.

A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{Petrify} spell reverses this effect immediately.

vxR33jABpWbixKMb.name: Impose Paralysis
vxR33jABpWbixKMb.description:
Trigger Cursebreaker hits a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} creature

Effect The creature must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round.

xoigCRlVfwponLe7.name: Inexorable March
xoigCRlVfwponLe7.description:
@Check[fortitude|dc:32|traits:damaging-effect]

On a critical success, the resisting creature takes no damage; otherwise it is damaged as if hit by Cursebreaker's fist.

The golem Strides up to its Speed, pushing back each creature whose space it moves into and damaging them if they try to stop its movement. A creature can attempt to bar the way by succeeding at a Fortitude save.

6yEfEcRS7ayfG7nE.name: Slowing Pulse
6yEfEcRS7ayfG7nE.description:
Each creature in a @Template[emanation|distance:10] must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:27|traits:incapacitation] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

Cursebreaker can't use Slowing Pulse again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Slowing Pulse]]{1d4 rounds}.

rl2d3yDbUo9Wxxil.name: Undo Curse
rl2d3yDbUo9Wxxil.description: Cursebreaker can cast a 10th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Cleanse Affliction} spell at will, targeting every resident of the city of Kibwe. Cursebreaker must be stationed in the upper level of the Archive of the Sun with its sun symbols activated to use this ability.

pTekS4C4K3Du058G.name: Bloody Fanaticism
pTekS4C4K3Du058G.description:
Trigger The cultist rolls a failure (but not a critical failure) on a Will save against an effect with the mental or fear trait

Effect The cultist takes @Damage[2d8[mental]] damage, and the saving throw is a success.

fPpIcm2oqCp5ZV1O.name: Demonic Strength
fPpIcm2oqCp5ZV1O.description: Angazhani cultists inflict an extra 1d6 damage with their spears, and any spear gains the fatal d10 trait while the cultist is using it (both the extra weapon damage die and the fatal trait have already been included in the cultist's spear Strikes above).

Fuming Sludge.name: Fuming Sludge
Fuming Sludge.description:
The slurry from alchemical experiments is often as flammable as it is toxic. In especially volatile cases, a fuming sludge can form from ignited pools of unstable alchemical runoff. It resembles a charcoal-colored slurry studded with tiny embers, and it continually emits a thin haze of accelerant that amplifies the fires it starts.

A fuming sludge must consume the base chemicals of living creatures to survive and can instinctively identify the complex molecules found in most animate creatures. The first meal of many a fuming sludge is its accidental creator, but it soon moves on to hunt in lush forests or densely populated settlements. A fuming sludge can extrude a powerful pseudopod to strike its victims, but it can also eject portions of its body with peristaltic contractions. These rapidly-cooling globs of goo slow down fleeing prey, but the cold, crusty residue can also alert canny explorers to their presence.

FwCskT2YJAzM7cuk.name: Chemical Sense 60 feet
FwCskT2YJAzM7cuk.description: A fuming sludge detects nearby living and undead creatures by their complex chemical compositions, but it can't detect elementals or other creatures composed of a single element.

G6GNPVLImrdv6kxR.name: Smoldering Haze
G6GNPVLImrdv6kxR.description:
15 feet. The fuming sludge constantly emits incendiary smoke that creates @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealment} around it. The smoke doesn't impair the fuming sludge's chemical sense. A creature that enters the aura or begins its turn in the aura becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@Check[fortitude|dc:25] negates) and cannot recover from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} for 1 round. It is then temporarily immune to the sickening effect of the smoldering haze for 1 minute.

A creature that is currently holding its breath, that doesn't need to breathe, or that's immune to poison is immune to the aura's sickened effect but not the concealment or inability to recover from persistent fire damage.

MV0bw03lRDMqBRNh.name: Cooling Glob
MV0bw03lRDMqBRNh.description:
A fuming sludge's ejected globs cling to targets.

A creature hit by an ejected glob Strike is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered} for 1 round.

If the attack was a critical hit, the creature is instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC 24).

QuRmNgkHRsoPGlzC.name: Protect the Master
QuRmNgkHRsoPGlzC.description:
Trigger Nyamat is targeted with an attack and a lower-ranking cultist is adjacent to him

Effect Nyamat orders their cultist to leap in front of the attack. The cultist and Nyamat swap places, and the cultist becomes the target of the attack.

x7G940ofhgAfmRHX.name: Demonic Strength
x7G940ofhgAfmRHX.description: Nyamat inflicts an extra 1d6 damage with his spear, and any spear gains the fatal d10 trait while Nyamat is using it (both the extra weapon damage die and the fatal trait have already been included in Nyamat's spear Strikes above).

0Uc5vldza5NMQl4c.name: Steady Spellcasting
0Uc5vldza5NMQl4c.description: If a would disrupt Nyamat's spellcasting action, on a successful @Check[flat|dc:15], the action isn't disrupted.

Ahvothian.name: Ahvothian
Ahvothian.description: Ahvothians are feral and cunning fiends from an Abyssal realm of jungles, dinosaurs, and relentless brutality. They resemble humanoid dinosaurs with narrow, fanged heads similar to raptors and solid, heavy legs like sauropods. Relentless trackers and survivalists, ahvothians are skilled at navigating jungles and are most commonly encountered stalking prey or operating out of fortified ruins. Ahvothians have an uncanny affinity with reptiles, and they often use dinosaurs-particularly carnivores such as allosauruses or deinonychuses-as hunting companions or guard animals. Although dangerous in large groups, ahvothians have such a strong desire to assert dominance over others that ahvothian armies frequently fall to infighting and bloody battles for dominance within days, or even hours. The mightiest ahvothians might lead dozens of their kin and herds of carnivorous dinosaurs.

E7RPGCghR7RuRFmy.name: Reptile Master
E7RPGCghR7RuRFmy.description: When an ahvothian uses an innate spell against a reptile, the DC is 27 rather than 23.

ObmsLNn679xvM3dS.name: Wicked Trophies
ObmsLNn679xvM3dS.description:
An ahvothian chooses a creature type (such as animal, celestial, or humanoid) from which they currently carry a trophy from a past kill.

Their weapon Strikes against creatures of that type deal an additional [[/r 1d10]] damage and they gain a +2 status bonus on Intimidation checks against creatures of that type.

The ahvothian doesn't lose these bonuses if they lose the trophies. Once per day, an ahvothian can change the creature type of their wicked trophies in a ritual that takes 1 hour.

Nearly all ahvothians encountered on the Material Plane have selected humanoids as the focus of their wicked trophies.
